_description: ‘A praier for al personis’, Esto mihi in deum protectorem — two couplets

Lam541.Transcription:
lorde be þou my kepere from all maner of synneþat þi
                    howys of blisse by grace y may wynneþer seruaunt lorde þat
                    þou bowtt with þi precyus blodeMake þem to þe to
                    hemselfe and to þer euencrystyn blessid & good
Lam541.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Five Middle English Verse Prayers from Lambeth MS. 541.” 
             Neophilologus
         38 (1954): 36-41: 39-40.
